zone.line: They approach you again, fluctuating Shapes!
The early ?thus once the troubled view beholds
The experiment I well you now have made to stop?
Feel I my heart still that error has inclined?
They throng you to! Now good thus may they dispose,
Thus they from vapour & cloud around me rise;
My bosom feels thus a juvenile shuddring
train
By the magic-blast of your touch Around thundered
They bring me you the images of a happy day
And every beloved shadow rises up
to
As an old man, a half told tale
Comes first Love & Friend ship with me up;
Anguish will anew, is it renews the sorrow
Of life labyrinthine to err the course
And calls the good, who, ?around a beautiful hour
Of happiness exchanges, ?you me away to throw
They hear not the following songs
Of souls, which I the first sang,
